text:
Question 152) In a tourist cable car, cable car leaves from sea level stations and the top of a mountain. The crossing lasts 1.5 minutes and both cable cars travel at the same speed. Forty seconds after the cable car from the station at sea level, he crosses the cable car, who had left the top of the mountain.
How many seconds after the match of cable car broke the cable car?
A) 5
B) 10
C) 15
D) 20
E) 25
